p: All experiments were performed in five replicates, and the data were expressed as mean values Â± standard deviation. The analysis of variance (ANOVA) was used in the statistical analysis of the data and was computed in SPSS Statistics 18.0 (SPSS Inc., Shanghai, China) software, and a probability value of P < 0.05 was considered to represent a statistically significant difference among mean values. Principal component analysis was calculated in Origin Pro 2016 (OriginLab Corporation, USA) software.
